alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden and Leon Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Quincy to 18 miles south of Greensboro. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Macon Community Park, Brown House, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Killearn Estates, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Bloxham, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex and Governors Square Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
